text: I sprosi ikh (mnogobozhnikov), o prorok, o Tom, kto zhe vedot ikh vo mrake po sushe ili po moryu, kto napravlyayet vetry radostnoy vest'yu o dozhde, yavlyayushchemsya miloserdiyem ot Allakha im?! Razve yest' drugoy bog naryadu s Allakhom, kto by mog eto sdelat'?! Poistine, Allakh prevyshe togo, chtoby Yemu pripisyvali kogo-libo v souchastniki - khvala Yemu Vsemogushchemu
